languages.text: "Я был бы готов рассказать тебе больше, но не могу — не из-за запретов {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Инквизиции{/g}, а потому что информация обрывочна и не проверена. Судя по тому, что мы узнали здесь, мы — в тюрьме одной из арен, на которых друкари убивают пленников на потеху своей публике. Эти {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносы{/g} питаются болью... а значит, подобные развлечения — не только блажь, но и необходимость для этих исчадий. Боль нужна им больше, чем воздух, которым они дышат — а значит, представления должны проходить постоянно... и значит, рейды за новыми жертвами не должны останавливаться".

traits.locale_text: "Я был бы готов рассказать тебе больше, но не могу — не из-за запретов {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Инквизиции{/g}, а потому что информация обрывочна и не проверена. Судя по тому, что мы узнали здесь, мы — в тюрьме одной из арен, на которых друкари убивают пленников на потеху своей публике. Эти {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносы{/g} питаются болью... а значит, подобные развлечения — не только блажь, но и необходимость для этих исчадий. Боль нужна им больше, чем воздух, которым они дышат — а значит, представления должны проходить постоянно... и значит, рейды за новыми жертвами не должны останавливаться".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "I would tell you more, but I can't — not because of the prohibitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}, but because the information is fragmentary and unverified. Based on what we have learned here, we are in the prison of one of the arenas where the Drukhari kill their prisoners as public entertainment. These {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} feed off pain... which means that entertainments like this are not a whim, but a necessity for these abominations. They need pain more than they need air to breathe, and so these performances must be held unceasingly... and raids to acquire new victims must continue without interruption."
languages.original_text: "Я был бы готов рассказать тебе больше, но не могу — не из-за запретов {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Инквизиции{/g}, а потому что информация обрывочна и не проверена. These {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} feed off pain... which means that entertainments like this are not a whim, but a necessity for these abominations. They need pain more than they need air to breathe, and so these performances must be held unceasingly... and raids to acquire new victims must continue without interruption."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我本希望能告诉你更多信息，但我做不到。这并不是由于{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}审判庭{/g}的禁令，而是由于我掌握的这些信息都很零散，没有经过核实。根据我们所掌握的情况，我们目前身处竞技场的监狱里。作为公共娱乐表演，黑暗灵族会在竞技场中杀死他们的囚犯。这种{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}以痛苦为食……这意味着，像这样的娱乐活动并非心血来潮，而是这些怪物必不可少的惯例。他们需要痛苦才能维持生命，就像需要空气才能呼吸一样。因此，他们会不停地举行这样的杀戮……也就是说，他们会一刻不停地袭击外界，猎取新的受害者。”
languages.original_text: "I would tell you more, but I can't — not because of the prohibitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}, but because the information is fragmentary and unverified. Based on what we have learned here, we are in the prison of one of the arenas where the Drukhari kill their prisoners as public entertainment. These {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} feed off pain... which means that entertainments like this are not a whim, but a necessity for these abominations. They need pain more than they need air to breathe, and so these performances must be held unceasingly... and raids to acquire new victims must continue without interruption."

traits.locale_text: “我本希望能告诉你更多信息，但我做不到。这并不是由于{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}审判庭{/g}的禁令，而是由于我掌握的这些信息都很零散，没有经过核实。根据我们所掌握的情况，我们目前身处竞技场的监狱里。作为公共娱乐表演，黑暗灵族会在竞技场中杀死他们的囚犯。这种{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}以痛苦为食……这意味着，像这样的娱乐活动并非心血来潮，而是这些怪物必不可少的惯例。他们需要痛苦才能维持生命，就像需要空气才能呼吸一样。因此，他们会不停地举行这样的杀戮……也就是说，他们会一刻不停地袭击外界，猎取新的受害者。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "I would tell you more, but I can't — not because of the prohibitions of the Inquisition, but because the information is fragmentary and unverified. Based on what we have learned here, we are in the prison of one of the arenas where the Drukhari kill their prisoners as public entertainment. These xenos feed off pain... which means that entertainments like this are not a whim, but a necessity for these abominations. They need pain more than they need air to breathe, and so these performances must be held unceasingly... and raids to acquire new victims must continue without interruption."

languages.text: «Me gustaría contarle más, pero no puedo. No por las prohibiciones de la {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisición{/g}, sino porque la información está incompleta y no verificada. Por lo que hemos descubierto aquí, esta es la prisión de uno de los coliseos en los que los Drukhari matan a sus prisioneros como entretenimiento público. Estos {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} se alimentan del dolor... lo que significa que este tipo de entretenimiento no es pura diversión, sino una necesidad para las abominaciones que nos retienen. Necesitan el dolor más de lo que necesitan el aire que respiran, por lo que estos espectáculos deben ser constantes... y las incursiones para obtener nuevas víctimas deben sucederse de forma ininterrumpida».
languages.original_text: "I would tell you more, but I can't — not because of the prohibitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}, but because the information is fragmentary and unverified. Based on what we have learned here, we are in the prison of one of the arenas where the Drukhari kill their prisoners as public entertainment. These {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} feed off pain... which means that entertainments like this are not a whim, but a necessity for these abominations. They need pain more than they need air to breathe, and so these performances must be held unceasingly... and raids to acquire new victims must continue without interruption."

traits.locale_text: «Me gustaría contarle más, pero no puedo. No por las prohibiciones de la {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisición{/g}, sino porque la información está incompleta y no verificada. Por lo que hemos descubierto aquí, esta es la prisión de uno de los coliseos en los que los Drukhari matan a sus prisioneros como entretenimiento público. Estos {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} se alimentan del dolor... lo que significa que este tipo de entretenimiento no es pura diversión, sino una necesidad para las abominaciones que nos retienen. Necesitan el dolor más de lo que necesitan el aire que respiran, por lo que estos espectáculos deben ser constantes... y las incursiones para obtener nuevas víctimas deben sucederse de forma ininterrumpida».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「もう少し情報を伝えたいところなのだが…{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}異端審問庁{/g}の禁止事項のためではなく、情報が断片的で検証されていないがゆえに、詳しいことは話せない。ここでの情報を総合すると、私たちがいるのはデュカーリが娯楽として囚人を殺している闘技場の牢獄のようだ。この{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}は苦痛を糧としている…つまり、このような娯楽は気まぐれではなく、彼らにとって必要なものなのだ。彼らは呼吸する空気よりも苦痛を必要としている。だから、このようなパフォーマンスは絶え間なく開催されなければならない…そして、新たな犠牲者を得るための襲撃は途切れることなく続けなければならないのだ」
languages.original_text: "I would tell you more, but I can't — not because of the prohibitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}, but because the information is fragmentary and unverified. Based on what we have learned here, we are in the prison of one of the arenas where the Drukhari kill their prisoners as public entertainment. These {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} feed off pain... which means that entertainments like this are not a whim, but a necessity for these abominations. They need pain more than they need air to breathe, and so these performances must be held unceasingly... and raids to acquire new victims must continue without interruption."

traits.locale_text: 「もう少し情報を伝えたいところなのだが…{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}異端審問庁{/g}の禁止事項のためではなく、情報が断片的で検証されていないがゆえに、詳しいことは話せない。ここでの情報を総合すると、私たちがいるのはデュカーリが娯楽として囚人を殺している闘技場の牢獄のようだ。この{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}は苦痛を糧としている…つまり、このような娯楽は気まぐれではなく、彼らにとって必要なものなのだ。彼らは呼吸する空気よりも苦痛を必要としている。だから、このようなパフォーマンスは絶え間なく開催されなければならない…そして、新たな犠牲者を得るための襲撃は途切れることなく続けなければならないのだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich würde Euch ja noch mehr berichten, doch das kann ich nicht — nicht, weil die {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} es verbieten würde, sondern weil die Informationen nur bruchstückhaft und unverifiziert sind. Nach allem, was wir hier erfahren haben, befinden wir uns im Gefängnis einer der Arenen, in denen die Drukhari zur Belustigung der Öffentlichkeit ihre Gefangenen töten. Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} ernähren sich von Schmerz. Solche Unterhaltungsformen sind also keine bloße Laune, sie sind für diese Abscheulichkeiten eine Notwendigkeit. Sie brauchen Schmerz dringender als Atemluft, daher müssen diese Spektakel ohne Unterlass veranstaltet werden ... und sie müssen laufend Überfälle durchführen, um neue Opfer zu beschaffen."
languages.original_text: "I would tell you more, but I can't — not because of the prohibitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}, but because the information is fragmentary and unverified. Based on what we have learned here, we are in the prison of one of the arenas where the Drukhari kill their prisoners as public entertainment. These {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} feed off pain... which means that entertainments like this are not a whim, but a necessity for these abominations. They need pain more than they need air to breathe, and so these performances must be held unceasingly... and raids to acquire new victims must continue without interruption."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde Euch ja noch mehr berichten, doch das kann ich nicht — nicht, weil die {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} es verbieten würde, sondern weil die Informationen nur bruchstückhaft und unverifiziert sind. Nach allem, was wir hier erfahren haben, befinden wir uns im Gefängnis einer der Arenen, in denen die Drukhari zur Belustigung der Öffentlichkeit ihre Gefangenen töten. Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} ernähren sich von Schmerz. Solche Unterhaltungsformen sind also keine bloße Laune, sie sind für diese Abscheulichkeiten eine Notwendigkeit. Sie brauchen Schmerz dringender als Atemluft, daher müssen diese Spektakel ohne Unterlass veranstaltet werden ... und sie müssen laufend Überfälle durchführen, um neue Opfer zu beschaffen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « J'aimerais pouvoir vous en dire plus, mais je ne peux pas. Non pas à cause d'une quelconque interdiction de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}, mais parce que toutes les informations que nous avons à propos de cet endroit sont au mieux fragmentées, et dans tous les cas non confirmées. D'après ce que nous avons appris ici, nous sommes actuellement détenus dans une prison de l'une des arènes où les Drukharis exécutent publiquement leurs prisonniers. Comme vous le savez, ces {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} se repaissent de la souffrance... ce qui signifie que pour ces abominations, ces mises à mort ne sont pas de simples spectacles, mais bien une question de survie. Ils ont plus besoin de souffrance que d'air pour vivre, c'est pour cette raison que l'arène ne ferme jamais... et qu'ils partent sans cesse à la recherche de nouvelles victimes dans l'espace réel. »
languages.original_text: "I would tell you more, but I can't — not because of the prohibitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}, but because the information is fragmentary and unverified. Based on what we have learned here, we are in the prison of one of the arenas where the Drukhari kill their prisoners as public entertainment. These {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} feed off pain... which means that entertainments like this are not a whim, but a necessity for these abominations. They need pain more than they need air to breathe, and so these performances must be held unceasingly... and raids to acquire new victims must continue without interruption."

traits.locale_text: « J'aimerais pouvoir vous en dire plus, mais je ne peux pas. Non pas à cause d'une quelconque interdiction de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}, mais parce que toutes les informations que nous avons à propos de cet endroit sont au mieux fragmentées, et dans tous les cas non confirmées. D'après ce que nous avons appris ici, nous sommes actuellement détenus dans une prison de l'une des arènes où les Drukharis exécutent publiquement leurs prisonniers. Comme vous le savez, ces {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} se repaissent de la souffrance... ce qui signifie que pour ces abominations, ces mises à mort ne sont pas de simples spectacles, mais bien une question de survie. Ils ont plus besoin de souffrance que d'air pour vivre, c'est pour cette raison que l'arène ne ferme jamais... et qu'ils partent sans cesse à la recherche de nouvelles victimes dans l'espace réel. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Daha da sayarım ama saymayacağım. {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Engizisyon{/g} yasak etti diye değil. Tam ve kesin bilmediğim için. Burada öğrendiklerimizden yola çıkarak bir arenanın hapishanesinde olduğumuzu söyleyebilirim. Drukhariler burada mahkûmları öldürüp milleti eğlendirir. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Zenolar{/g}, acıdan besleniyor işte... Sanma ki bunlar, sırf yaratıklar eğlensin diye. Tam aksine bir gereksinim. Bunların soluduğu havayı kes, gördüğü acıyı kesme. Anlayacağın, bu gösterilerin devamlı sürmesi lazım. Baskınlar yapılacak ki kesintisiz kurban akışı sağlansın."
languages.original_text: "I would tell you more, but I can't — not because of the prohibitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}, but because the information is fragmentary and unverified. Based on what we have learned here, we are in the prison of one of the arenas where the Drukhari kill their prisoners as public entertainment. These {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} feed off pain... which means that entertainments like this are not a whim, but a necessity for these abominations. They need pain more than they need air to breathe, and so these performances must be held unceasingly... and raids to acquire new victims must continue without interruption."

Bunların soluduğu havayı kes, gördüğü acıyı kesme. Anlayacağın, bu gösterilerin devamlı sürmesi lazım. Baskınlar yapılacak ki kesintisiz kurban akışı sağlansın."
